title: Help me riot
body: I just bought the wrong Corki skin I missclicked dragon wing in the heat of the moment and I really wanted urf rider is there anything I can do to get switch?

replies.body:
Hey there man,

If you have any refunds left on your account you can use one of those, [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) guide shows how to refund your purchases.

Otherwise it would seem you're out of luck.

>**I ACCIDENTALLY PURCHASED SOMETHING! CAN I HAVE A FREE REFUND?**
>We will not provide free refunds for accidental purchases under any circumstances. The only way for you to refund an accidentally purchased item is by using your refund token. When making a purchase, please double check to make sure you are buying your desired item. The store will prompt you to confirm before completing the purchase.

Hope this helps.
